Changelog:
NEW FEATURES:
-Mesh Tab: Allows the exporting of any mesh in the game using either a folder view or flat view to navigate.
-Filters: Added advanced filters for singling out certain types of assets
-Favoriting: Press Ctrl+F while selecting an asset to favorite that asset. You can filter by favorites now as well.
-HeightMap Exporter: Located in the tools tab. Exports heightmap, normalmap, and weightmap textures for the BR map.
-Manual Blender Version: You can now add a blender version number manually to the Sync Plugin window.
